rect.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: rgb(244, 244, 244); stroke-opacity: 0; pointer-events: none;

text.style: fill: rgb(49, 49, 49); font-family: "Fira Code"; font-size: 100.6px; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: -7px; word-spacing: -3.5px; white-space: pre; pointer-events: none;

path.style: stroke-dashoffset: -50px; stroke-dasharray: 4, 10; vector-effect: non-scaling-stroke; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke: rgb(92, 216, 121); stroke-width: 3px; stroke-opacity: 0.31;

text.style: fill: rgb(104, 104, 104); font-family: Charter; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 700; text-transform: uppercase; white-space: pre; pointer-events: none;

svg.text: Peep through some hobbyist programming articles
